document_data.mainbody:
Viln Tirin was a drow gang leader and cultist in Menzoberranzan in the late 15 century DR.
Viln led the Bandersnatches, a gang of young demon-worshiping drow in West Wall district. They hoped to spread more chaos in the city in the wake of Demogorgons rampage circa 1486 DR.
Viln and her gangsters had a quasit advisor.
